name: Bioretention (SI)
description: This wizard create a bioretention model with underdrain

connectors.name: Bottom center to native left
connectors.from: Native soil underneath the engineered soil

connectors.name: Soil to Groundwater center
connectors.from: Native soil underneath the engineered soil

parameters.name: pond_coefficient_alpha
parameters.question: Pond storage-depth coefficient 'a' in relationship S=a*h^b

parameters.name: pond_exponent_beta
parameters.question: Pond storage-depth exponent 'b' in relationship S=a*h^b

parameters.name: system_area
parameters.question: Bioretention area

parameters.name: eng_soil_n_y
parameters.question: Number of cells adjacent to the engineered soil

parameters.name: native_soil_n_y
parameters.question: Number of cells layers underneath the engineered soil

parameters.name: length
parameters.question: The total length of the bioswale

parameters.name: depth_to_groundwater
parameters.question: Depth to groundwater

parameters.name: eng_soil_K_s
parameters.question: Engineered soil Saturated Hydraulic Conductivity

parameters.name: Catchment_area
parameters.question: The area of impervious contributing area

parameters.name: Catchment_slope
parameters.question: The slope of the impervious contributing area

parameters.name: Catchment_Manning_coefficient
parameters.question: Effective Manning's roughness coefficient of the impervious contributing area

parameters.name: Catchment_mean_width
parameters.question: Catchment average width

parameters.name: eng_soil_alpha
parameters.question: Engineered soil Van Genuchten alpha parameter

parameters.name: eng_soil_n
parameters.question: Engineered soil Van Genuchten n parameter

parameters.name: eng_soil_theta_res
parameters.question: Engineered soil residual moisture content

parameters.name: eng_soil_theta_sat
parameters.question: Engineered soil residual moisture content

parameters.name: native_soil_K_s
parameters.question: Nagtive soil hydraulic conductivity

parameters.name: native_soil_alpha
parameters.question: Native soil Van Genuchten alpha parameter

parameters.name: native_soil_n
parameters.question: Native soil Van Genuchten n parameter

parameters.name: native_soil_theta_res
parameters.question: Native soil residual moisture content

parameters.name: native_soil_theta_sat
parameters.question: Native soil saturated moisture content

parameters.name: eng_soil_height
parameters.question: Depth of the engineered soil medium

parameters.name: eng_soil_width
parameters.question: The total width of the bioswale engineered soil

parameters.name: TimeSeriesFileName
parameters.question: Precipitation file name

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.question: Simulation Start Date

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.question: Simulation End Date

criteria.name: length_crit
criteria.errormessage: Bioswale length must be greater than zero!

criteria.name: eng_soil_height_crit
criteria.errormessage: Engineered soil height must be greater than zero!

criteria.name: depth_to_groundwater_crit
criteria.errormessage: Engineered soil depth must be smaller than depth to groundwater

criteria.name: eng_soil_width_crit
criteria.errormessage: Engineered soil width must be greater than zero!

parameter_groups.name: eng_soil_physical_parameter
parameter_groups.description: Physical parameters of the engineered soil medium

parameter_groups.name: native_soil_physical_parameter
parameter_groups.description: Physical parameters of the native soil
